name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Ricky MARLOWE, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Ricky MARLOWE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgments of sentence are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Allen M. Tabas, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Steven J. Cooper-stein, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 337
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Ricky MARLOWE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 22, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Allen M. Tabas, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Steven J. Cooper-stein, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
